DESCRIPTION: View a list of all the profanity words in your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}viewprofanity** ~ Views all the non-strict words in your profanity filter.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}viewprofanity strict** ~ Views all the **strict** words in your profanity filter.
NONE_FOUND: There were no words found in the profanity filter at this time. To add words, use the **setprofanity** command.
